summary: what do you think of wandi and walker im general? i shipped wandi for awhile after the bash mitzvah episode, and i’m still kinda...
question: what do you think of wandi and walker im general? i shipped wandi for awhile after the bash mitzvah episode, and i’m still kinda upset how they wasted his character when andi went back to jonah and how we have that wuffy mess.
answer:
I pretty much agree with what you said. I liked his character’s introduction at the Bar Mitzvah. I don’t think I really shipped him with Andi, but his scenes with her were still cute, and I liked him as a character.

I saw Wuffy coming when it was confirmed that Buffy had a crush on someone (I knew it wasn’t actually Jonah for the most part). But I didn’t really like that it was rushed into at the start of season 3, and how it has been used as a plot device to cause this useless feud between Buffy and Andi. In hindsight, Wuffy makes a lot of sense bc when he shows up to draw a picture of tghc before Buffy moves, she is clearly attracted to him. Wuffy actually would have had potential if it weren’t for the rift with Andi (which I don’t blame Andi for reacting how she does, I blame the writers for dragging it out so much).

But yeah, overall I like Walker… I just forget he exists bc its already guaranteed that he never really becomes Part of the group ya know. The scene he had with Buffy and Cyrus in the s3 premiere was golden. His character’s personality reminds me a bit of Zay from GMW and I wish we could have seen more development on that instead of him just being a cheap plot device but oh well. It’s so weird to have him not become a member of the friend group since almost all of the recurring characters (Amber, TJ, even Kira) seem to but oh well.

summary:
TJ: You seem surprised.
Cyrus: I thought you’d be some scary punk kid who may or may not be a cannibal..
TJ: Dude, I just listen...
body:
TJ: You seem surprised.

Cyrus: I thought you’d be some scary punk kid who may or may not be a cannibal..

TJ: Dude, I just listen to “emo” music and dress like this because I like to.

Cyrus: So you’re not a cannibal?

TJ: Nope. If it makes things better, my favorite show is Once Upon a Time.

Cyrus: One with the princesses and fairytales? Do you actually believe what they say about love?

TJ: Well, yeah. I like to believe if you’re meant to be with someone.. you’ll be with them. Even if people say you shouldn’t.

Cyrus: I guess that makes sense..

TJ: We could watch it together sometime? If you’d like.

Cyrus: Yeah, I’d like that.

Cyrus: Yeah, I’d like that.

blog.name: captainkippen
blog.title: you can be oblivious
blog.description: aaron • he/him • requests are open • fic masterlist • icon by simplycyrus

summary: So I've been thinking about the "TJ & Andi meet through Motocross" prompt I got the other day and I know I wrote a ficlet for it...
body:
So I’ve been thinking about the “TJ & Andi meet through Motocross” prompt I got the other day and I know I wrote a ficlet for it but the temptation to write a chaptered fic about it is strong…

Imagine:

  • Kippen Siblings banter
  • Amber would suddenly have much more of an interest in her brother’s Motocross stuff after meeting Andi
  • “I’m just trying to be support of you, TJ!” stfu amber you liar you’re just gay and andi is pretty
  • Meanwhile, Andi brings Cyrus to the circuit one day because he wants to be supportive of her racing (like he is with Jonah’s frisbeeing) and she introduces him to TJ
  • TJ’s immediately like well shit that’s the prettiest boy I’ve ever seen
  • Cyrus does not notice TJ hitting on him.
  • At first Cyrus is like ‘cool a new friend’
  • And then TJ whips off his helmet after a race one day and he’s smiling and his hair is all messed up and Cyrus is like “oh no he’s cute”
  • It flicks between Ambi and Tyrus, all four of them just being complete disaster gays

summary: Metcalf's Treble Heart
title: Metcalf's Treble Heart
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2RzN2f2

by TyrusLittleMuffin (EmoSheepPrince)

Dr. Metcalf has always led a double life of being the strict, rule enforcing principle at Jefferson Middle School by day and a music, tattoo loving guy at night. Metcalf didn’t think he’ll ever find someone else to share his love of music with until he met the father of a boy that Bowie had once been teaching.

blog.description:
sadie. 23. she/they. lesbian. here to talk about tv & give advice. hoodie enthusiast. fandom mother.

main blog & twitter: sadieannerue instagram: dailymackcast, andimackpapercraneproject

summary: What’s an unpopular opinion you have about AM?
question: What’s an unpopular opinion you have about AM?
answer:
Initially my answer would have been the fact that Andi Mack should NOT move to Freeform or Netflix, as I was shouting that into the void before I even made an AM blog. I would now add the addition that I am content with only three seasons of the show and don’t necessarily want a fourth, although I think people are slowly starting to agree with that more. The only reason I really push for s4 is because I know that most of the cast wants it and I literally just want those kids to be happy lol.

As far as like, opinions about the content of the series itself, like ships, etc. I don’t think most of mine are that unpopular. Jandi should remain platonic, and in most situations I care more about platonic development between friends than I care about romantic ships, which kind of applies to most shows I watch.

As far as like, opinions about the content of the series itself, like ships, etc. I don’t think most of mine are that unpopular. Jandi should remain platonic, and in most situations I care more about platonic development between friends than I care about romantic ships, which kind of applies to most shows I watch.
